FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 114 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 update on line 42: + GOLD D' MEDAGLIA, by Medaglia d'Oro. Unplaced in 1 start, $3,500. Sent from United States to Saudi Arabia in 2022. Half-sister to **CLOSE TO THE EDGE** ($358,532, 1st Governor's Cup H. (FPX, $27,750), etc.). Dam of 5 foals, 2 to race, 2 winners--
